CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper May 19, 1945, pg. 8, reads: "Win War Bond Citations - Workers of the Negro Women's Division of the War Finance Committee of Allegheny County were awarded citations last Thursday night at Ebenezer Baptist Church. Mrs. Clifford S. Heinz, Mrs. Gwilym Price and Mrs. Charles Elmers presented the citations. Mrs. Viola Sams (third from left, front row) was named Major General, the highest ranking war bond seller in Allegheny County. Mrs. Heinz is shown presenting a citation to Mrs. Alma A. Polk, who has achieved remarkable success in the war bond drives. - Courier Photos by Harris."
TitMainTitle: Mrs. Clifford S. Heinz presenting war bond citation to Alma A. Polk on left, with Jessie Vann seated in background in Ebenezer Baptist Church
